about_the_game:
Inspired heavily from games like N++ and Marble Madness, Careful detail was paid to ensure smooth, responsive and satisfying movement.

GamePlay
Levels are grouped by 5. You are given 60 seconds to get to the finish portal; any items you collect on the way will increase your time. Don't worry about falling off the platforms, you will simply re-spawn with the same time amount and get to try again. The uniquely crafted obstacles offer vastly different experiences with every level.

Your ball has special controls!!
- Double Jump: You can jump while you are in the air!
- Air Control: You have the ability to move while you are not in contact, but with less force.
- Brakes: Sometimes things get a little crazy, slow it all down with the push of a button.

Unique Obstacles
- Gravity Fields: Get pulled in various directions to help you traverse difficult situations
- Tubes: A hamsters dream.
- Lasers: These hurt... but man are they fun to watch destroy your ball.

Crafted with love
Manually built and tested levels ensure a dynamic experience that we have complete control over every aspect of level design. Each of the in game objects is modeled by us to match the look feel and user experience.

short_description: You're a ball that collects items! Vibe to original tunes in this physics based time trial 3d platformer while you push a ball through a series of dynamic obstacles that affect your movement and destroy you in novel ways.
